column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I was disappointed that during my visit a couple of key pieces I wanted to view (American Gothic
column2: for one) were being loaned out. That information should be prominently displayed in the website for prospective visitors. I wouldn't have minded coming back so much if the admission fee wasn't so high
column3: $23!! Coming from New York where many cultural institutions are free or offer heavy discounts for many groups ( students
column5: etc.) I was a bit outraged.
